description: Enough time to heat a glass of milk in a microwave
Enough time to enjoy a nice pepperoni pizza
Enough time to watch George of the Jungle, what a classic!
Enough time to have a nice date
Enough time to finish your daily shift at your office
Enough time to enjoy a nice mountain day trip with you friends
Enough time to watch the entire Cobra Kai TV show
Enough time to go to the moon and back with a spaceship
Enough time to play the whole Kingdom Hearts series
